synopsis.text: This anime follows the life of Rem Ayanokouji, a seemingly ordinary woman who leads a double life as a powerful Dream Hunter. By day, she runs a detective agency that specializes in supernatural cases, and by night, she becomes a formidable Dream Warrior, battling evil demons that invade people's dreams and threaten to steal their life force. With her trusty pets, Alpha and Beta, who transform into a fierce tiger and wolf, Rem embarks on thrilling adventures to protect humanity from the sinister forces lurking in their dreams. Originally produced as a single-episode OVA with explicit content, the series was later revised to exclude sexual scenes and expanded into multiple episodes, ensuring a captivating and action-packed experience for viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
